Jersey_City.James J. Walker Park: James J. Walker Park is a public park in the Greenwich Village neighborhood of Lower Manhattan in New York City, New York. The approximately 2-acre (0.81 ha) park, is bounded by Varick Street, Leroy Street, Hudson Street and Clarkson Street. The park has baseball fields, bocce courts, playgrounds, bathrooms, handball courts and Wi-Fi hotspots, as well as a memorial dedicated to two deceased firefighters.
